sourceMeaningMnemonic: In the <radical>foot</radical> <radical>capital</radical>, it's tough to be a <radical>dog</radical> because you're always getting <kanji>kick</kanji>ed.
meaningInfo: In the foot capital, you can only use your feet. So petting dogs looks a lot like kicking them.
readingMnemonic: When you <kanji>kick</kanji> a dog, there's an explosion of <reading><ja>毛</ja></reading> (<ja>け</ja>).
readingInfo: People in the foot capital are very kick-happy, so you can imagine how much <ja>毛</ja> is in the streets.
